'''Adaldrida Brandybuck, n√©e Bolger''', was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]]

==History==
Adaldrida was the daughter of [[Gundahar Bolger]] and [[Dina Diggle]]. She was the younger sister of [[Adalgar Bolger|Adalgar]].<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref> 

Adaldrida married [[Marmadoc Brandybuck]], and had four children: [[Gorbadoc Brandybuck|Gorbadoc]], [[Orgulas Brandybuck|Orgulas]] and two daughters.<ref>{{App|Brandybuck}}</ref>

== Etymology ==
''Adaldrida'' may be a Germanic name composed of the elements ''adal'' "noble" and a 2nd element.
